--- Switchblade ---

Switchblade looks up from admiring his handywork on the console, "Yo 
yo, Megs, what's up?" He starts heading out of the base. Soon he 
arrives at Megatron, "Hey Megs, whadda ya want me to do?" He says 
then takes a closer look at the bots with Megatron. One that was 
quite damaged, he didn't know. The other however, was... Shockwave?!? 
He stopped looking before it became a stare and waits impassively for 
Megatron's response.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> "We are too vulnerable right now to launch attacks." Megatron turned
> around, showing the base. "It is right in the open, where the 
Stunticons
> landed it. They may be formidable warriors, but they have no sense 
of
> defense." Megatron opened his com-link once again. "Switchblade, I 
need
> you out here on the double." He looked at Shockwave. "Switchblade 
can
> fix him." he commented.
